14 class ConfigError(Exception):
15  """
16  Exception called when sensor is configured incorrectly
17  """
18 
19  def __init__(self, allowed_values):
20  description = "Not a valid config. Value must be in %s" % allowed_values
21  super().__init__(description)

24 class Sensor:
25 
26  @abstractmethod
27  def startup():
28  pass
29 
30  @abstractmethod
31  def get_raw_data():
32  pass
33 
34  @staticmethod
35  def get_value(low, high):
36  """
37  Converting bit value of two 8-bit registers to one
38  """
39  value = (high << 8) | low
40 
41  if (value > 32768):
42  value = value - 65536
43  return value

126 class MPU6050(Accelerometer, Gyroscope):
127  PWR_M = 0x6B
128  DIV = 0x19
129  CONFIG = 0x1A
130  GYRO_CONFIG = 0x1B
131  ACCEL_CONFIG = 0x1C
132  INT_EN = 0x38
133  ACCEL_XOUT_H = 0x3B
134  ACCEL_XOUT_L = 0x3C
135  ACCEL_YOUT_H = 0x3D
136  ACCEL_YOUT_L = 0x3E
137  ACCEL_ZOUT_H = 0x3F
138  ACCEL_ZOUT_L = 0x40
139  TEMP_OUT_H = 0x41
140  TEMP_OUT_L = 0x42
141  GYRO_XOUT_H = 0x43
142  GYRO_XOUT_L = 0x44
143  GYRO_YOUT_H = 0x45
144  GYRO_YOUT_L = 0x46
145  GYRO_ZOUT_H = 0x47
146  GYRO_ZOUT_L = 0x48
147 
148  ACCEL_RANGE_2G = 0x00
149  ACCEL_RANGE_4G = 0x08
150  ACCEL_RANGE_8G = 0x10
151  ACCEL_RANGE_16G = 0x18
152 
153  GYRO_RANGE_250DEG = 0x00
154  GYRO_RANGE_500DEG = 0x08
155  GYRO_RANGE_1000DEG = 0x10
156  GYRO_RANGE_2000DEG = 0x18
157 
158  MPU6050_ADDR = 0x68
159 
160  def __init__(self, bus, accel_range=2, gyro_range=250):
161 
162  allowed_accel_range = (2, 4, 8, 16)
163  allowed_gyro_range = (250, 500, 1000, 2000)
164 
165  if accel_range not in allowed_accel_range:
166  raise ConfigError(allowed_accel_range)
167  if gyro_range not in allowed_gyro_range:
168  raise ConfigError(allowed_gyro_range)
169 
170  if accel_range == 2:
171  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_2G
172  elif accel_range == 4:
173  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_4G
174  elif accel_range == 8:
175  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_8G
176  elif accel_range == 16:
177  self.accel_config = self.ACCEL_RANGE_16G
178 
179  if gyro_range == 250:
180  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_250DEG
181  elif accel_range == 500:
182  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_500DEG
183  elif accel_range == 1000:
184  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_1000DEG
185  elif accel_range == 2000:
186  self.gyro_config = self.GYRO_RANGE_2000DEG
187 
188  self.bus = bus
189  self.set_accelerometer_range(float(accel_range))
190  self.set_gyroscope_range(float(gyro_range))
191 
192  def startup(self):
193  """
194  Configuring Sensor with writing values to configure registers
195  """
196  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.DIV, 7)
197  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.PWR_M, 1)
198  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.CONFIG, 0)
199  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.GYRO_CONFIG, self.gyro_config)
200  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.ACCEL_CONFIG, self.accel_config)
201  self.bus.write_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.INT_EN, 1)
202  rospy.sleep(1)
203 
204  def read_status(self):
205  """
206  Read status register of sensor
207  """
208  return self.bus.read_byte_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.REG_STATUS)
209 
210  def get_raw_data(self, calibrated=False):
211  """
212  reading data registers with values which provided by sensor
213  param calibrated: if flag is on, apply calibration params to calculate values
214  return:
215  ax, ay, az - the projections of the gravity vector onto the axis x, y, z
216  gx, gy, gz - angles of rotation about the axis x, y, z
217  """
218  buf = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(self.MPU6050_ADDR, self.ACCEL_XOUT_H, 14)
219  ax = self.get_value(buf[1], buf[0])
220  ay = self.get_value(buf[3], buf[2])
221  az = self.get_value(buf[5], buf[4])
222 
223  gx = self.get_value(buf[9], buf[8])
224  gy = self.get_value(buf[11], buf[10])
225  gz = self.get_value(buf[13], buf[12])
226 
227  self.setA(ax, ay, az)
228  self.setG(gx, gy, gz)
229 
230  return ax, ay, az, gx, gy, gz

233 class QMC5883(Magnetometer):
234  XOUT_LSB = 0x00
235  XOUT_MSB = 0x01
236  YOUT_LSB = 0x02
237  YOUT_MSB = 0x03
238  ZOUT_LSB = 0x04
239  ZOUT_MSB = 0x05
240  REG_STATUS = 0x06
241  TOUT_LSB = 0x07
242  TOUT_MSB = 0x08
243  REG_CONTROL_1 = 0x09
244  REG_CONTROL_2 = 0x0A
245  REG_PERIOD = 0x0B
246  ADDRESS = 0x0D
247 
248  # Oversampling values for the CONFIG register
249  CONFIG_OS512 = 0b00000000
250  CONFIG_OS256 = 0b01000000
251  CONFIG_OS128 = 0b10000000
252  CONFIG_OS64 = 0b11000000
253 
254  # Range values for the CONFIG register
255  CONFIG_2GAUSS = 0b00000000
256  CONFIG_8GAUSS = 0b00010000
257 
258  # Rate values for the CONFIG register
259  CONFIG_10HZ = 0b00000000
260  CONFIG_50HZ = 0b00000100
261  CONFIG_100HZ = 0b00001000
262  CONFIG_200HZ = 0b00001100
263 
264  # Mode values for the CONFIG register
265  CONFIG_STANDBY = 0b00000000
266  CONFIG_CONT = 0b00000001
267 
268  # Mode values for the CONFIG2 register
269  CONFIG2_INT_DISABLE = 0b00000001
270  CONFIG2_ROL_PTR = 0b01000000
271  CONFIG2_SOFT_RST = 0b10000000
272 
273  # INI_FILE = Path(__file__).resolve().parent / 'settings' / 'QMC5883.ini'
274 
275  def __init__(self, bus, oversampling=512, range=2, rate=100, mode=1):
276 
277  allowed_oversampling = (512, 256, 128, 64)
278  allowed_range = (2, 8)
279  allowed_rate = (10, 50, 100, 200)
280  allowed_mode = (0, 1)
281 
282  if oversampling not in allowed_oversampling:
283  raise ConfigError(allowed_oversampling)
284  if range not in allowed_range:
285  raise ConfigError(allowed_range)
286  if rate not in allowed_rate:
287  raise ConfigError(allowed_rate)
288  if mode not in allowed_mode:
289  raise ConfigError(allowed_mode)
290 
291  if oversampling == 512:
292  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS512
293  elif oversampling == 256:
294  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS256
295  elif oversampling == 128:
296  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS128
297  elif oversampling == 64:
298  self.oversampling_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_OS64
299 
300  if range == 2:
301  self.range_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_2GAUSS
302  elif range == 8:
303  self.range_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_8GAUSS
304 
305  if rate == 10:
306  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_10HZ
307  elif rate == 50:
308  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_50HZ
309  elif rate == 100:
310  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_100HZ
311  elif rate == 200:
312  self.rate_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_200HZ
313 
314  if mode == 0:
315  self.mode_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_STANDBY
316  elif mode == 1:
317  self.mode_config = QMC5883.CONFIG_CONT
318 
319  self.oversampling = oversampling
320  self.range = range
321  self.rate = rate
322  self.mode = mode
323 
324  self.bus = bus
325  self.set_magnetometer_range(float(range))

327  def startup(self):
328  """
329  Configuring Sensor with writing values to configure registers
330  """
331  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_CONTROL_1,
332  self.oversampling_config | self.range_config | self.rate_config | self.mode_config)
333  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_CONTROL_2, QMC5883.CONFIG2_ROL_PTR)
334  self.bus.write_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, QMC5883.REG_PERIOD, 0x01)
335  rospy.sleep(1)

337  def read_status(self):
338  """
339  Read status register of sensor
340  """
341  return self.bus.read_byte_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, self.REG_STATUS)
342 
343  def get_raw_data(self):
344  """
345  reading data registers with values which provided by sensor
346  param calibrated: if flag is on, apply calibration params to calculate values
347  return:
348  x, y, z - the projections of the magnetic vector onto the axis x, y, z
349  """
350  buf = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(QMC5883.ADDRESS, self.XOUT_LSB, 6)
351  x = Sensor.get_value(buf[0], buf[1])
352  y = Sensor.get_value(buf[2], buf[3])
353  z = Sensor.get_value(buf[4], buf[5])
354 
355  self.setM(x, y, z)
356 
357  return x, y, z

360 class MS5837_30BA(Barometer):
361  ADC_READ = 0x00
362  RESET = 0x1E
363  CONVERT_D1_OSR256 = 0x40
364  CONVERT_D1_OSR512 = 0x42
365  CONVERT_D1_OSR1024 = 0x44
366  CONVERT_D1_OSR2048 = 0x46
367  CONVERT_D1_OSR4096 = 0x48
368  CONVERT_D1_OSR8192 = 0x4A
369  CONVERT_D2_OSR256 = 0x50
370  CONVERT_D2_OSR512 = 0x52
371  CONVERT_D2_OSR1024 = 0x54
372  CONVERT_D2_OSR2048 = 0x56
373  CONVERT_D2_OSR4096 = 0x58
374  CONVERT_D2_OSR8192 = 0x5A
375  PROM_READ = 0xA0
376 
377  MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS = 0x76
378 
379  def __init__(self, bus):
380  self.bus = bus
381  self.depth_mean = []
382 
383  def startup(self):
384  self.bus.write_byte(self.MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, self.RESET)
385  rospy.sleep(.01)
386  print('ok')
387  self.C = []
388  for i in range(7):
389  c = self.bus.read_word_data(self.MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, self.PROM_READ + 2 * i)
390  c = ((c & 0xFF) << 8) | (c >> 8)
391  self.C.append(c)
392  crc = (self.C[0] & 0xF000) >> 12
393  if crc != self._crc4(self.C):
394  return
395  # print(self.l, crc, crc == self.crc4(self.l))
396 
397  def _crc4(self, n_prom):
398  n_rem = 0
399 
400  n_prom[0] = ((n_prom[0]) & 0x0FFF)
401  n_prom.append(0)
402 
403  for i in range(16):
404  if i % 2 == 1:
405  n_rem ^= ((n_prom[i >> 1]) & 0x00FF)
406  else:
407  n_rem ^= (n_prom[i >> 1] >> 8)
408 
409  for n_bit in range(8, 0, -1):
410  if n_rem & 0x8000:
411  n_rem = (n_rem << 1) ^ 0x3000
412  else:
413  n_rem = (n_rem << 1)
414 
415  n_rem = ((n_rem >> 12) & 0x000F)
416 
417  self.n_prom = n_prom
418  self.n_rem = n_rem
419 
420  return n_rem ^ 0x00
421 
422  def getPressure(self, conversion=100):
423  return self.getP() * conversion
424 
425  def getDepth(self):
426  return round((self.getPressure() - 101325) / (9.80665 * 997), 2)
427 
428  def getAltitude(self):
429  return round((1 - pow((self.getPressure() / 101325), .190295)) * 145366.45 * .3048, 2)
430 
431  def get_raw_data(self):
432  self.bus.write_byte(self.MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, self.CONVERT_D1_OSR8192)
433  rospy.sleep(2.5e-6 * 2 ** (8 + 5))
434  pdata = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(self.MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, self.ADC_READ, 3)
435  D1 = pdata[0] << 16 | pdata[1] << 8 | pdata[2]
436  self.bus.write_byte(self.MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, self.CONVERT_D2_OSR8192)
437  rospy.sleep(2.5e-6 * 2 ** (8 + 5))
438  tdata = self.bus.read_i2c_block_data(self.MS5837_30BA_ADDRESS, self.ADC_READ, 3)
439  D2 = tdata[0] << 16 | tdata[1] << 8 | tdata[2]
440  self.calculate(D1, D2)
441 
442  def setT(self, T):
443  self.T = T
444 
445  def getT(self):
446  return self.T
447 
448  def calculate(self, D1, D2):
449  OFFi = 0
450  SENSi = 0
451  Ti = 0
452 
453  dT = D2 - self.C[5] * 256
454 
455  SENS = self.C[1] * 32768 + (self.C[3] * dT) / 256
456  OFF = self.C[2] * 65536 + (self.C[4] * dT) / 128
457  pr = (D1 * SENS / (2097152) - OFF) / (8192)
458 
459  temp = 2000 + dT * self.C[6] / 8388608
460 
461  if temp / 100 < 20:
462  Ti = (3 * dT * dT) / 8589934592
463  OFFi = (3 * (temp - 2000) * (temp - 2000)) / 2
464  SENSi = (5 * (temp - 2000) * (temp - 2000)) / 8
465  if temp / 100 < -15:
466  OFFi = OFFi + 7 * (temp + 1500) * (temp + 1500)
467  SENSi = SENSi + 4 * (temp + 1500) * (temp + 1500)
468  else:
469  Ti = 2 * (dT * dT) / 137438953472
470  OFFi = (temp - 2000) * (temp - 2000) / 16
471  SENSi = 0
472 
473  OFF2 = OFF - OFFi
474  SENS2 = SENS - SENSi
475 
476  temp = (temp - Ti) / 100
477  pr = ((D1 * SENS2 / 2097152 - OFF2) / 8192) / 10.0
478  self.setP(pr)
479  self.setT(temp)

482 class InertialNavigationSystem:
483 
484  def __init__(self):
485  self.sensors = {}
486 
487  self._ax = 0
488  self._ay = 0
489  self._az = 0
490  self._gx = 0
491  self._gy = 0
492  self._gz = 0
493  self._mx = 0
494  self._my = 0
495  self._mz = 0
496 
497  self.roll = 0
498  self.pitch = 0
499  self.yaw = 0
500  self.vx = 0
501  self.vy = 0
502  self.vz = 0
503  self.xpos = 0
504  self.ypos = 0
505  self.depth = 0
506 
507  self.madgwick_filter = MadgwickAHRS()
508 
509  self.config_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.dirname(__file__)), 'config/config.ini')
510  self.configparser = ConfigParser()
511  self.configparser.read(self.config_path)
512 
513  def startup_sensors(self, sensors):
514  for sensor in sensors:
515  if isinstance(sensor, Accelerometer):
516  self.sensors['accelerometer'] = sensor
517  if isinstance(sensor, Gyroscope):
518  self.sensors['gyroscope'] = sensor
519  if isinstance(sensor, Magnetometer):
520  self.sensors['magnetometer'] = sensor
521  if isinstance(sensor, Barometer):
522  self.sensors['barometer'] = sensor
523  sensor.startup()
524  if not self.sensors['accelerometer'] or not self.sensors['gyroscope']:
525  raise NotImplementedError
526  if not self.sensors['magnetometer']:
527  raise Warning
528 
529  def set_real_sensor_values(self):
530  """
531  convert raw binary sensor values into decimal unit system
532  """
533 
534  def convert(data, sensor_range):
535  for index in range(len(data)):
536  data[index] = data[index] / 32768.0 * sensor_range
537  return data
538 
539  sensors = set(val for val in self.sensors.values())
540  for sensor in sensors:
541  sensor.get_raw_data()
542  ax, ay, az = self.sensors['accelerometer'].getA()
543  gx, gy, gz = self.sensors['gyroscope'].getG()
544  mx, my, mz = self.sensors['magnetometer'].getM()
545  pressure = self.sensors['barometer'].getP()
546  self.depth = self.sensors['barometer'].getDepth()
547  self._ax, self._ay, self._az = convert([ax, ay, az], self.sensors['accelerometer'].get_accelerometer_range())
548  self._gx, self._gy, self._gz = convert([gx, gy, gz], self.sensors['gyroscope'].get_gyroscope_range())
549  # self._mx, self._my, self._mz = mx, my, mz
550  self._mx, self._my, self._mz = convert([mx, my, mz], self.sensors['magnetometer'].get_magnetometer_range())
551  # print(
552  # round(self._ax, 2),round(self._ay, 2),round(self._az, 2),
553  # round(self._gx, 2),round(self._gy, 2),round(self._gz, 2),
554  # # self._mx,self._my,self._mz
555  # )
556 
557  def get_v(self):
558  return self._ax, self._ay, self._az, self._gx, self._gy, self._gz
559 
560  def __calibrate_magnetometer(self, rounds):
561  """
562  Magnetometer calibration
563  rounds: number of read cycles
564  """
565  xmin, ymin, zmin = 32767, 32767, 32767
566  xmax, ymax, zmax = -32768, -32768, -32768
567  print("Rotate compass")
568  rospy.sleep(2)
569  for _ in range(rounds):
570  self.set_real_sensor_values()
571  print(self._mx, self._my, self._mz)
572 
573  xmin = min(xmin, self._mx)
574  ymin = min(ymin, self._my)
575  zmin = min(zmin, self._mz)
576 
577  xmax = max(xmax, self._mx)
578  ymax = max(ymax, self._my)
579  zmax = max(zmax, self._mz)
580  rospy.sleep(0.005)
581 
582  x_offset = (xmax + xmin) / 2
583  y_offset = (ymax + ymin) / 2
584  z_offset = (zmax + zmin) / 2
585 
586  chord_x = (xmax - xmin) / 2.0
587  chord_y = (ymax - ymin) / 2.0
588  chord_z = (zmax - zmin) / 2.0
589 
590  chord_average = (chord_x + chord_y + chord_z) / 3.0
591 
592  x_scale = chord_average / chord_x
593  y_scale = chord_average / chord_y
594  z_scale = chord_average / chord_z
595 
596  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "mxoffset", str(x_offset))
597  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "myoffset", str(y_offset))
598  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "mzoffset", str(z_offset))
599  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "mxscale", str(x_scale))
600  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "myscale", str(y_scale))
601  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "mzscale", str(z_scale))
602 
603  def __calibrate_gyroscope_and_accelerometer(self, rounds):
604  """
605  Gyroscope and accelerometer calibration
606  rounds: number of read cycles
607  """
608  gxcal, gycal, gzcal = 0, 0, 0
609  axcal, aycal, azcal = 0, 0, 0
610  print("Keep gyroscope steady")
611  rospy.sleep(5)
612  for _ in range(rounds):
613  self.set_real_sensor_values()
614 
615  print(round(self._ax, 2), round(self._ay, 2), round(self._az, 2), round(self._gx, 2), round(self._gy, 2),
616  round(self._gz, 2))
617 
618  gxcal += self._gx
619  gycal += self._gy
620  gzcal += self._gz
621  axcal += self._ax
622  aycal += self._ay
623  azcal += self._az - 1
624 
625  rospy.sleep(.005)
626 
627  gxcal /= rounds
628  gycal /= rounds
629  gzcal /= rounds
630  axcal /= rounds
631  aycal /= rounds
632  azcal /= rounds
633 
634  self.configparser.set("Gyroscope", "gxoffset", str(gxcal))
635  self.configparser.set("Gyroscope", "gyoffset", str(gycal))
636  self.configparser.set("Gyroscope", "gzoffset", str(gzcal))
637  self.configparser.set("Accelerometer", "axoffset", str(axcal))
638  self.configparser.set("Accelerometer", "ayoffset", str(aycal))
639  self.configparser.set("Accelerometer", "azoffset", str(azcal))
640 
641  def __compute_std(self, rounds=10000):
642  """
643  Collection of readings using calibration values with further calculation of standart deviations for Kalman filter
644  rounds: number of read cycles
645  """
646  storage = {
647  'ax': [],
648  'ay': [],
649  'az': [],
650  'gx': [],
651  'gy': [],
652  'gz': [],
653  'mx': [],
654  'my': [],
655  'mz': []
656  }
657  for _ in range(rounds):
658  self.set_real_sensor_values()
659  storage['ax'].append(self._ax)
660  storage['ay'].append(self._ay)
661  storage['az'].append(self._az)
662  storage['gx'].append(self._gx)
663  storage['gy'].append(self._gy)
664  storage['gz'].append(self._gz)
665  storage['mx'].append(self._mx)
666  storage['my'].append(self._my)
667  storage['mz'].append(self._mz)
668  axstd = np.std(storage['ax'])
669  aystd = np.std(storage['ay'])
670  azstd = np.std(storage['az'])
671  gxstd = np.std(storage['gx'])
672  gystd = np.std(storage['gy'])
673  gzstd = np.std(storage['gz'])
674  mxstd = np.std(storage['mx'])
675  mystd = np.std(storage['my'])
676  mzstd = np.std(storage['mz'])
677 
678  self.configparser.set("Accelerometer", "axstd", str(axstd))
679  self.configparser.set("Accelerometer", "aystd", str(aystd))
680  self.configparser.set("Accelerometer", "azstd", str(azstd))
681  self.configparser.set("Gyroscope", "gxstd", str(gxstd))
682  self.configparser.set("Gyroscope", "gystd", str(gystd))
683  self.configparser.set("Gyroscope", "gzstd", str(gzstd))
684  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "mxstd", str(mxstd))
685  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "mystd", str(mystd))
686  self.configparser.set("Magnetometer", "mzstd", str(mzstd))
687 
688  def set_configured_values(self):
689  """
690  reading calibration values and calculating sensor values using them
691  """
692  self.set_real_sensor_values()
693 
694  self._gx = self._gx - self.configparser.getfloat("Gyroscope", "gxoffset")
695  self._gy = self._gy - self.configparser.getfloat("Gyroscope", "gyoffset")
696  self._gz = self._gz - self.configparser.getfloat("Gyroscope", "gzoffset")
697  self._mx = (self._mx - self.configparser.getfloat("Magnetometer", "mxoffset")) * self.configparser.getfloat(
698  "Magnetometer", "mxscale")
699  self._my = (self._my - self.configparser.getfloat("Magnetometer", "myoffset")) * self.configparser.getfloat(
700  "Magnetometer", "myscale")
701  self._mz = (self._mz - self.configparser.getfloat("Magnetometer", "mzoffset")) * self.configparser.getfloat(
702  "Magnetometer", "mzscale")
703  self._gx = -gy
704  self._ax = self._ax - self.configparser.getfloat("Accelerometer", "axoffset")
705  self._ay = self._ay - self.configparser.getfloat("Accelerometer", "ayoffset")
706  self._az = self._az - self.configparser.getfloat("Accelerometer", "azoffset")
707 
708  def update_state(self, dt):
709  """
710  calculating of Euler angles
711  return: list of Euler anlges
712  """
713  # self.set_configured_values()
714  self.set_real_sensor_values()
715  # print(round(self._ax, 2), round(self._ay, 2), round(self._az, 2), end=' ')
716  # vals = self.madgwick_filter.update([self._gx, self._gy, self._gz], [self._ax, self._ay, self._az], [self._mx, self._my, self._mz])
717  # angles, a = vals[:3], vals[3:]
718  # angles = [rad * 180 / 3.1415926535 for rad in angles]
719  # self.roll, self.pitch, self.yaw = angles
720  # self._ax, self._ay, self._az = a
721 
722  self.q = self.madgwick_filter.update([self._gx, self._gy, self._gz], [self._ax, self._ay, self._az],
723  [self._mx, self._my, self._mz])
724 
725  # self.kf.go(dt, self._ax, self._ay, self._az)
726 
727  # self._ax *= 9.80665
728  # self._ay *= 9.80665
729  # self._az *= 9.80665
730  # if yaw < 0: yaw += 360
731 
732  # print(round(self._ax, 2), round(self._ay, 2), round(self._az, 2))
733  # if not -0.1 < self._ax < 0.1:
734  # self.vx = round(self.vx + self._ax * dt, 2)
735  # if not -0.1 < self._ay < 0.1:
736  # self.vy = round(self.vy + self._ay * dt, 2)
737  # if not -0.1 < self._az < 0.1:
738  # self.vz = round(self.vz + self._az * dt, 2)
739 
740  # self.xpos = round(self.xpos + self.vx * dt, 2)
741  # self.ypos = round(self.ypos + self.vy * dt, 2)
742  # self.depth = round(self.depth + self.vz * dt, 2)
743  # self.roll = round(self.roll, 2)
744  # self.pitch = round(self.pitch, 2)
745  # self.yaw = round(self.yaw, 2)
746 
747  @property
748  def state(self):
749  # return [self.roll, self.pitch, self.yaw]
750  return self.q, self.depth
751 
752  def configure_system(self):
753  """
754  System setup
755  """
756  self.__calibrate_magnetometer(400)
757  self.__calibrate_gyroscope_and_accelerometer(400)
758  self.__compute_std(1000)
759  with open(self.config_path, 'w+') as config_params:
760  self.configparser.write(config_params)
761 
762 
763 def talker():
764  # pub = rospy.Publisher('talker_topic', Float32MultiArray, queue_size=10)
765  pub = rospy.Publisher('talker_topic', PoseStamped, queue_size=10)
766  imu_pub = rospy.Publisher('imu_pub', Imu, queue_size=5)
767  rospy.init_node('talker_node')
768  bus = smbus.SMBus(1)
769  SENSORS = [MPU6050(bus), QMC5883(bus), MS5837_30BA(bus)]
770  system = InertialNavigationSystem()
771  system.startup_sensors(SENSORS)
772  # imu = MPU6050(bus)
773  # compass = QMC5883(bus)
774  # press = MS5837_30BA(bus)
775  # imu.startup()
776  # compass.startup()
777  # press.startup()
778  rate = rospy.Rate(1000)
779  rospy.loginfo("Talker started")
780  # system.configure_system()
781  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
782  system.update_state(1)
783  # ax, ay, az, gx, gy, gz = imu.get_raw_data()
784  # mx, my, mz = compass.get_raw_data()
785 
786  # press.get_raw_data()
787  # alt = press.getAltitude()
788  q, z = system.state
789  # msg = "(%f, %f, %f)|(%f, %f, %f)|(%f, %f, %f)" % (state[0], state[1], state[2], state[3], state[4], state[5], state[6], state[7], state[8])
790  # msg = Float32MultiArray(data=state)
791  msg = PoseStamped()
792  msg.pose.orientation.w = q[0]
793  msg.pose.orientation.x = q[1]
794  msg.pose.orientation.y = q[2]
795  msg.pose.orientation.z = q[3]
796 
797  msg.pose.position.x = 0
798  msg.pose.position.y = 0
799  msg.pose.position.z = z
800 
801  imu_msg = Imu()
802  imu_msg.orientation.w = q[0]
803  imu_msg.orientation.x = q[1]
804  imu_msg.orientation.y = q[2]
805  imu_msg.orientation.z = q[3]
806 
807  pub.publish(msg)
808  imu_pub.publish(imu_msg)
809  rate.sleep()
810 
811 
812 if __name__ == '__main__':
813  try:
814  talker()
815  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
816  pass
